question: Which among the following countries does not border Uzbekistan?
explanation: There are only two  doubly landlocked countries (landlocked country surrounded from all sides by landlocked countries) in the world viz. Liechtenstein and Uzbekistan. Uzbekistan is surrounded by five landlocked countries viz. Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Afghanistan and Turkmenistan. Liechtenstein is in Central Europe and is surrounded by Switzerland and Austria.
